languages.text: "И в том твое право, элантах. Душа, неготовая к переменам, никогда не сможет раскрыться во всю свою силу. И потому я более не стану пытаться провести тебя духовной тропой, по которой ступаю сама".
"And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
languages.original_text: "И в том твое право, элантах. Душа, неготовая к переменам, никогда не сможет раскрыться во всю свою силу. И потому я более не стану пытаться провести тебя духовной тропой, по которой ступаю сама".

traits.locale_text: "And this is your right, elantach. A soul which is not ready for change will never open up to its' full potential. And thus I will no longer to lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And this is your right, elantach. A soul which is not ready for change will never open up to its' full potential. And thus I will no longer to lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你有权拒绝，外界人。若是灵魂没有做好准备，迎接改变，那永远不可能开发出自己全部的潜力。既然如此，我将不再试图引导你走上我所选择的精神之路。”
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: “你有权拒绝，外界人。若是灵魂没有做好准备，迎接改变，那永远不可能开发出自己全部的潜力。既然如此，我将不再试图引导你走上我所选择的精神之路。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Y estás en tu derecho, elantach. Un alma que no está lista para cambiar es incapaz de abrirse a su potencial pleno. Y por eso ya no te guiaré por la senda espiritual que yo misma estoy recorriendo».
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: «Y estás en tu derecho, elantach. Un alma que no está lista para cambiar es incapaz de abrirse a su potencial pleno. Y por eso ya no te guiaré por la senda espiritual que yo misma estoy recorriendo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est votre droit, elantach. Une âme qui refuse le changement ne parviendra jamais à s'ouvrir totalement. Dans ce cas, je ne vous accompagnerai plus sur la voie spirituelle que j'arpente aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: « C'est votre droit, elantach. Une âme qui refuse le changement ne parviendra jamais à s'ouvrir totalement. Dans ce cas, je ne vous accompagnerai plus sur la voie spirituelle que j'arpente aujourd'hui. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist Euer gutes Recht, Elantach. Eine Seele, die für Veränderung nicht bereit ist, wird sich niemals ihrem vollen Potenzial öffnen. Und darum werde ich Euch den spirituellen Pfad, den ich selbst beschreite, nicht länger anbieten."
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist Euer gutes Recht, Elantach. Eine Seele, die für Veränderung nicht bereit ist, wird sich niemals ihrem vollen Potenzial öffnen. Und darum werde ich Euch den spirituellen Pfad, den ich selbst beschreite, nicht länger anbieten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、それはお前の権利だ。変化を受け入れる準備ができていない魂は、決してその全ての可能性を開かない。そして、それゆえ我はもはや我自身が辿っている精神的な道に、お前を導くことはしない」
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、それはお前の権利だ。変化を受け入れる準備ができていない魂は、決してその全ての可能性を開かない。そして、それゆえ我はもはや我自身が辿っている精神的な道に、お前を導くことはしない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Reddetme hakkın var elantach. Değişime hazır olmayan bir ruh, hiçbir zaman tam potansiyeline erişemez. Bu yüzden artık kendi yürüdüğüm ruhani yolda sana rehberlik etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "And that is your right, elantach. A soul that is not ready for change will never open up to its full potential. And thus I will no longer lead you down the spiritual path that I myself follow."

traits.locale_text: "Reddetme hakkın var elantach. Değişime hazır olmayan bir ruh, hiçbir zaman tam potansiyeline erişemez. Bu yüzden artık kendi yürüdüğüm ruhani yolda sana rehberlik etmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
